pullRequest.title: Fix default proxy configuration format
pullRequest.bodyText:
Currently, default proxy configuration string parsing logic expects the env variable to be of the format hostname:port but typically, the configuration in env variable is of the format protocol://hostname:port.
This PR changes the parsing logic to check for either of these formats.
Fixes #10096

commit.message: Updated to use core proxy options to load

nodes.bodyText: This logic doesn't exist in SB either.... would you mind copy and paste it there? :D Kill two birds with 3 stones?

commit.message: Fix proxy configuration for Service Bus too
